66 // Constructor/Destructor
67 
68 TapiGui::TapiGui(ros::NodeHandle* nh, QWidget* parent) : QWidget(parent), ui(new Ui::TapiGui), nh(nh), parent(parent)
69 {
70  // Create an asynchronous spinner so ros callbacks are done in the background
71  spinner = new ros::AsyncSpinner(1);
72 
73  pendingChanges = false;
74 
75  // Create all necessary Services, Publishers and Subscribers
76  devListClient = nh->serviceClient<tapi_lib::GetDeviceList>("/Tapi/GetDeviceList");
77  delPub = nh->advertise<std_msgs::String>("/Tapi/DeleteConnection", 10000);
78  conPub = nh->advertise<tapi_lib::Connect>("/Tapi/ConnectFeatures", 10000);
79  conListClient = nh->serviceClient<tapi_lib::GetConnectionList>("/Tapi/GetConnectionList");
80  clearAllPub = nh->advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/Tapi/ClearAll", 2);
81  clearInactivePub = nh->advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/Tapi/ClearInactive", 2);
82  helloClient = nh->serviceClient<tapi_lib::Hello>("/Tapi/HelloServ");
83  lastUpdatedSub = nh->subscribe("/Tapi/LastChanged", 5, &TapiGui::updateAvailable, this);
84  spinner->start();
85  updateTimer = nh->createTimer(ros::Duration(CHECK_INTERVAL / 1000.0), &TapiGui::timer, this);
86  updateTimer.start();
87 
88  // Set up the gui and the gui-timer to renew/redraw the gui
89  ui->setupUi(this);
90  guitimer = new QTimer(this);
91  connect(guitimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(checkForGuiUpdate()));
92  timerInterval = 15;
93  guitimer->start(timerInterval);
94 
95  // Add vertical layouts to the scroll Areas
96  layoutSubscriber = ui->verticalLayoutSubscriber;
97  layoutPublisher = ui->verticalLayoutPublisher;
98  layoutSubscriber->setAlignment(Qt::AlignTop);
99  layoutPublisher->setAlignment(Qt::AlignTop);
100  ui->verticalLayoutKeys->setAlignment(Qt::AlignTop);
101 
102  selectedFeature = 0;
103  selectedGuiDevice = 0;
104 
105  // Connect the buttons to the funtions which shall be called on button clicks
106  connect(ui->loadButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SLOT(loadButtonClicked()));
107  connect(ui->saveButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SLOT(saveButtonClicked()));
108  connect(ui->clearAllButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SLOT(clearAllButtonClicked()));
109  connect(ui->clearInactiveButton, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SLOT(clearInactiveButtonClicked()));
110 
111  updateData();
112 }
113 
114 TapiGui::~TapiGui()
115 {
116  // Stop all publishers/subscribers/services and free allocated memory
117  guitimer->stop();
118  delete guitimer;
119  updateTimer.stop();
120  spinner->stop();
121  delete spinner;
122  conListClient.shutdown();
123  devListClient.shutdown();
124  lastUpdatedSub.shutdown();
125  delPub.shutdown();
126  conPub.shutdown();
127  clearAllPub.shutdown();
128  helloClient.shutdown();
129  delete ui;
130  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
131  delete it->second;
132 }
133 
134 // Protected member functions
135 
136 void TapiGui::paintEvent(QPaintEvent*)
137 {
138  QPainter painter(this);
139  painter.setPen(Qt::black);
140 
141  // Draw all connections
142  for (auto it = connections.begin(); it != connections.end(); ++it)
143  {
144  string publisherUUID = it->second.GetPublisherUUID();
145  string publisherFeatureUUID = it->second.GetPublisherFeatureUUID();
146  string subscriberUUID = it->second.GetSubscriberUUID();
147  string subscriberFeatureUUID = it->second.GetSubscriberFeatureUUID();
148  Tapi::GuiDevice *publisher, *subscriber;
149  publisher = 0;
150  subscriber = 0;
151 
152  // Check if both devices exists
153  if (publisherGuiDevices.count(publisherUUID) > 0)
154  publisher = publisherGuiDevices.at(publisherUUID);
155  if (!publisher)
156  continue;
157  if (subscriberGuiDevices.count(subscriberUUID) > 0)
158  subscriber = subscriberGuiDevices.at(subscriberUUID);
159  if (!subscriber)
160  continue;
161 
162  // Check if their features acutally exists which shall be connected and get their coordinates
163  QPoint begin, end;
164  Tapi::Feature* feature = publisher->GetFeatureByUUID(publisherFeatureUUID);
165  if (!feature)
166  continue;
167  begin = publisher->mapTo(this, publisher->FeatureBoxPosition(feature));
168  feature = subscriber->GetFeatureByUUID(subscriberFeatureUUID);
169  if (!feature)
170  continue;
171  end = subscriber->mapTo(this, subscriber->FeatureBoxPosition(feature));
172 
173  // Draw the connection
174  painter.drawLine(begin, end);
175  }
176 
177  // Draw line for current (pending) connection
178  if (!selectedFeature || !selectedGuiDevice)
179  return;
180  QPoint end = mapFromGlobal(mousePosition);
181  QPoint begin = selectedGuiDevice->mapTo(this, selectedGuiDevice->FeatureBoxPosition(selectedFeature));
182  painter.drawLine(begin, end);
183 }
184 
185 // Private member functions
186 
187 void TapiGui::addDeviceToTapi(uint8_t type, string name, string uuid, map<string, Tapi::Feature> features)
188 {
189  tapi_lib::Hello hello;
190  hello.request.DeviceType = type;
191 
192  // Copy all features into a vector of feature messages and use this as the features part of the hello request
193  vector<tapi_lib::Feature> featureVec;
194  for (auto it = features.begin(); it != features.end(); ++it)
195  {
196  tapi_lib::Feature feature;
197  feature.FeatureType = it->second.GetType();
198  feature.Name = it->second.GetName();
199  feature.UUID = it->second.GetUUID();
200  featureVec.push_back(feature);
201  }
202  hello.request.Features = featureVec;
203 
204  // Generate a standard header
205  std_msgs::Header header;
206  header.seq = 1;
207  ros::Time now = ros::Time::now();
208  header.stamp = now;
209  hello.request.Header = header;
210 
211  // Copy the rest of the necessary data to the hello request
212  hello.request.Name = name;
213  hello.request.UUID = uuid;
214 
215  // Call the hello service
216  if (!helloClient.call(hello))
217  ROS_ERROR("Couldn't connect to hello service.");
218  if (hello.response.Status == tapi_lib::HelloResponse::StatusError)
219  ROS_ERROR("Error when connection to hello service");
220 }
221 
222 bool TapiGui::compareDeviceNames(const Tapi::GuiDevice* first, const Tapi::GuiDevice* second)
223 {
224  string temp1, temp2;
225  temp1 = first->GetName();
226  temp2 = second->GetName();
227  transform(temp1.begin(), temp1.end(), temp1.begin(), ::towlower);
228  transform(temp2.begin(), temp2.end(), temp2.begin(), ::towlower);
229  bool result = temp1 < temp2;
230  return result;
231 }
232 
233 void TapiGui::connectFeatures(string feature1uuid, string feature2uuid, double coefficient)
234 {
235  tapi_lib::Connect msg;
236  msg.Coefficient = coefficient;
237  msg.Feature1UUID = feature1uuid;
238  msg.Feature2UUID = feature2uuid;
239  conPub.publish(msg);
240 }
241 
242 void TapiGui::deleteConnection(string subscriberFeatureUUID)
243 {
244  std_msgs::String msg;
245  msg.data = subscriberFeatureUUID;
246  delPub.publish(msg);
247 }
248 
249 vector<Tapi::GuiDevice*> TapiGui::getDevicesSorted()
250 {
251  // Iterate through all devices, save a pointer to each and then sort the vector
252  vector<Tapi::GuiDevice*> devicesList;
253  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
254  devicesList.push_back(it->second);
255  if (devicesList.size() > 1)
256  sort(devicesList.begin(), devicesList.end(), compareDeviceNames);
257  return devicesList;
258 }
259 
260 void TapiGui::timer(const ros::TimerEvent& e)
261 {
262  // When there should be an update but there was none, assume that there may have been changes
263  if (lastUpdated.toNSec() + (CHECK_INTERVAL * 1000) < ros::Time::now().toNSec())
264  pendingChanges = true;
265 }
266 
267 void TapiGui::updateAvailable(const std_msgs::Time::ConstPtr& time)
268 {
269  // The core told us he made an update, so we should check that and save this as the last update time
270  if (time->data.toNSec() > lastUpdated.toNSec())
271  pendingChanges = true;
272 }
273 
274 void TapiGui::updateData()
275 {
276  pendingChanges = false;
277  lastUpdated = ros::Time::now();
278 
279  // Call the core and get the current list of all linked devices
280  tapi_lib::GetDeviceList devSrv;
281  devSrv.request.Get = true;
282  if (!devListClient.call(devSrv))
283  {
284  ROS_ERROR("Failed to establish connection to core");
285  return;
286  }
287 
288  // Now iterate through all devices, copy its data and update our devices. If they don't exist: Create them.
289  vector<tapi_lib::Device> devVect = devSrv.response.Devices;
290  for (auto it = devVect.begin(); it != devVect.end(); ++it)
291  {
292  bool active = it->Active;
293  uint8_t deviceType = it->DeviceType;
294  unsigned long heartbeat = it->Heartbeat;
295  ros::Time lastSeen = it->LastSeen;
296  unsigned long lastSeq = it->LastSeq;
297  string name = it->Name;
298  string uuid = it->UUID;
299  vector<tapi_lib::Feature> featureVec = it->Features;
300  map<string, Tapi::Feature> featureMap;
301  for (auto it2 = featureVec.begin(); it2 != featureVec.end(); ++it2)
302  {
303  string featureType = it2->FeatureType;
304  string featureName = it2->Name;
305  string featureUUID = it2->UUID;
306 
307  // Manipulate the feature name by adding the coefficient as a suffix to show it to the user
308  if ((connections.count(featureUUID) > 0) &&
309  (featureType == "std_msgs/Byte" || featureType == "std_msgs/Float32" || featureType == "std_msgs/Float64" ||
310  featureType == "std_msgs/Int16" || featureType == "std_msgs/Int32" || featureType == "std_msgs/Int64" ||
311  featureType == "std_msgs/Int8" || featureType == "std_msgs/UInt16" || featureType == "std_msgs/UInt32" ||
312  featureType == "std_msgs/UInt64" || featureType == "std_msgs/UInt8"))
313  {
314  double coefficient = connections.at(featureUUID).GetCoefficient();
315  string strCoeff = to_string(coefficient);
316  strCoeff.erase(strCoeff.find_last_not_of('0') + 1, string::npos);
317  featureName = featureName + " (x" + strCoeff + "0)";
318  }
319  Tapi::Feature feature(featureType, featureName, featureUUID);
320  featureMap.emplace(featureUUID, feature);
321  }
322  if (devices.empty() || devices.count(uuid) == 0)
323  {
324  Tapi::GuiDevice* device =
325  new Tapi::GuiDevice(parent, deviceType, name, uuid, lastSeq, lastSeen, heartbeat, featureMap);
326  devices.emplace(uuid, device);
327  pendingChanges = true;
328  }
329  else if (devices.count(uuid) == 1)
330  {
331  devices.at(uuid)->Update(deviceType, name, lastSeq, lastSeen, heartbeat, featureMap);
332  pendingChanges = true;
333  }
334  else
335  continue;
336 
337  if (!active)
338  devices.at(uuid)->Deactivate();
339  }
340 
341  // Check if there were devices missing in the service call, but we still have them -> delete them in the gui as well
342  vector<string> toDelete;
343  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
344  {
345  bool found = false;
346  string devUUID = it->first;
347  for (auto it2 = devVect.begin(); it2 != devVect.end(); ++it2)
348  if (it2->UUID == devUUID)
349  {
350  found = true;
351  break;
352  }
353  if (!found)
354  toDelete.push_back(devUUID);
355  }
356  for (auto it = toDelete.begin(); it != toDelete.end(); ++it)
357  {
358  if (subscriberGuiDevices.count(*it) > 0)
359  {
360  disconnect(subscriberGuiDevices.at(*it), SIGNAL(featureClicked(Tapi::GuiDevice*, Tapi::Feature*)), 0, 0);
361  subscriberGuiDevices.at(*it)->hide();
362  subscriberGuiDevices.erase(*it);
363  }
364  else if (publisherGuiDevices.count(*it) > 0)
365  {
366  disconnect(publisherGuiDevices.at(*it), SIGNAL(featureClicked(Tapi::GuiDevice*, Tapi::Feature*)), 0, 0);
367  publisherGuiDevices.at(*it)->hide();
368  publisherGuiDevices.erase(*it);
369  }
370  delete devices.at(*it);
371  devices.erase(*it);
372  }
373 
374  // Now call the core to get a list of all connections
375  tapi_lib::GetConnectionList conSrv;
376  conSrv.request.Get = true;
377  if (!conListClient.call(conSrv))
378  {
379  ROS_ERROR("Failed to establish connection to core");
380  return;
381  }
382 
383  // Iterate through this vector of connections and check what has changed, renew if necessary
384  vector<tapi_lib::Connection> conVect = conSrv.response.Connections;
385  for (auto it = conVect.begin(); it != conVect.end(); ++it)
386  {
387  if (devices.count(it->SubscriberUUID) == 0 || devices.count(it->PublisherUUID) == 0)
388  // Try to connect non existend devices -> try next connection
389  continue;
390  if (connections.count(it->SubscriberFeatureUUID) == 0)
391  // No connection on this device yet -> store connection
392  {
393  Tapi::Connection connection(it->PublisherUUID, it->PublisherFeatureUUID, it->SubscriberUUID,
394  it->SubscriberFeatureUUID, it->Coefficient);
395  connections.emplace(it->SubscriberFeatureUUID, connection);
396  pendingChanges = true;
397  }
398  else if (connections.at(it->SubscriberFeatureUUID).GetPublisherFeatureUUID() != it->PublisherFeatureUUID)
399  // Subscriber already connected, but publisher has changed, delete old connection and store new one
400  {
401  string subscriberFeatureUUID = it->SubscriberFeatureUUID;
402  connections.erase(subscriberFeatureUUID);
403  Tapi::Connection connection(it->PublisherUUID, it->PublisherFeatureUUID, it->SubscriberUUID,
404  it->SubscriberFeatureUUID, it->Coefficient);
405  connections.emplace(subscriberFeatureUUID, connection);
406  pendingChanges = true;
407  }
408  }
409 
410  // Now check if the gui know connections, but the core not (anymore). Then we have to delete them, the core is our
411  // boss ;)
412  vector<string> deletableConnections;
413  for (auto it = connections.begin(); it != connections.end(); ++it)
414  {
415  bool found = false;
416  string searchUUID = it->first;
417  for (auto it2 = conVect.begin(); it2 != conVect.end(); ++it2)
418  if (searchUUID == it2->SubscriberFeatureUUID)
419  found = true;
420  if (!found)
421  {
422  deletableConnections.push_back(searchUUID);
423  pendingChanges = true;
424  }
425  }
426  for (auto it = deletableConnections.begin(); it != deletableConnections.end(); ++it)
427  connections.erase(*it);
428 }
429 
430 // Slot functions
431 
432 void TapiGui::clearAllButtonClicked()
433 {
434  selectedFeature = 0;
435  selectedGuiDevice = 0;
436  std_msgs::Bool msg;
437  msg.data = true;
438  clearAllPub.publish(msg);
439  update();
440 }
441 
442 void TapiGui::clearInactiveButtonClicked()
443 {
444  std_msgs::Bool msg;
445  msg.data = true;
446  clearInactivePub.publish(msg);
447 }
448 
449 void TapiGui::checkForGuiUpdate()
450 {
451  // Looks like there is new data in the core -> check it
452  if (pendingChanges)
453  updateData();
454 
455  // There really was an update of the data, so we have to redraw the gui
456  if (pendingChanges)
457  {
458  // Now remove all GuiDevices from the gui
459  for (auto it = publisherGuiDevices.begin(); it != publisherGuiDevices.end(); ++it)
460  {
461  disconnect(it->second, SIGNAL(featureClicked(Tapi::GuiDevice*, Tapi::Feature*)), 0, 0);
462  it->second->hide();
463  layoutPublisher->removeWidget(it->second);
464  }
465  publisherGuiDevices.clear();
466  for (auto it = subscriberGuiDevices.begin(); it != subscriberGuiDevices.end(); ++it)
467  {
468  disconnect(it->second, SIGNAL(featureClicked(Tapi::GuiDevice*, Tapi::Feature*)), 0, 0);
469  it->second->hide();
470  layoutSubscriber->removeWidget(it->second);
471  }
472  subscriberGuiDevices.clear();
473 
474  // Take the new list of devices and draw them
475  vector<Tapi::GuiDevice*> devicesSorted = getDevicesSorted();
476  for (auto it = devicesSorted.begin(); it != devicesSorted.end(); ++it)
477  {
478  if ((*it)->GetType() == tapi_lib::Device::Type_Publisher)
479  {
480  layoutPublisher->addWidget(*it);
481  publisherGuiDevices.emplace((*it)->GetUUID(), *it);
482  }
483  else
484  {
485  layoutSubscriber->addWidget(*it);
486  subscriberGuiDevices.emplace((*it)->GetUUID(), *it);
487  }
488  (*it)->show(); // don't forget to show it
489 
490  // Always connect the feaureClicked signal of each device to our featureClicked slot
491  connect(*it, SIGNAL(featureClicked(Tapi::GuiDevice*, Tapi::Feature*)), this,
492  SLOT(featureClicked(Tapi::GuiDevice*, Tapi::Feature*)));
493 
494  // Iterate through every feature to check, if we already generated a color in the key-table for its type (if not,
495  // add an entry to the keys)
496  vector<Tapi::Feature*> features = (*it)->GetSortedFeatures();
497  for (auto it2 = features.begin(); it2 != features.end(); ++it2)
498  {
499  string type = (*it2)->GetType();
500  if (colorKeys.count(type) == 0)
501  {
502  QColor color = GuiDevice::stringToColor(type);
503  colorKeys.emplace(type, color);
504  QLabel* key = new QLabel();
505  QString format("<font color=\"%1\">%2 </font> %3");
506  key->setText(format.arg(color.name(), "█ ", type.c_str()));
507  ui->verticalLayoutKeys->addWidget(key);
508  key->show();
509  }
510  }
511  }
512  pendingChanges = false;
513  }
514 
515  // The user has currently a pending selection to connect two devices/features. Track the mouse and save the current
516  // position if it has changes
517  if (selectedFeature)
518  {
519  QPoint newMousePosition = QCursor::pos();
520  if (newMousePosition != mousePosition)
521  mousePosition = newMousePosition;
522 
523  // The device became inactive during the try to connect it, now deselect it
524  if (!selectedGuiDevice->Active())
525  {
526  selectedFeature = 0;
527  selectedGuiDevice = 0;
528  }
529  }
530  update();
531 }
532 
533 void TapiGui::featureClicked(Tapi::GuiDevice* guidevice, Tapi::Feature* feature)
534 {
535  // Clicked twice on the same feature or device is inactive -> demarcate selection
536  if ((selectedFeature && selectedFeature == feature) || !guidevice->Active())
537  {
538  selectedFeature = 0;
539  selectedGuiDevice = 0;
540  update();
541  return;
542  }
543 
544  // Device is a Subscriber or ServiceClient and already connected -> ask for deletion or substitution
545  if (guidevice->GetType() == tapi_lib::Device::Type_Subscriber && connections.count(feature->GetUUID()) > 0)
546  {
547  QMessageBox msgBox;
548  if (selectedFeature && guidevice->GetType() != selectedGuiDevice->GetType() &&
549  selectedFeature->GetType() == feature->GetType())
550  {
551  string msg = "Replace connection of \"" + feature->GetName() + "\"?";
552  msgBox.setWindowTitle("Feature already connected");
553  msgBox.setText(QString::fromStdString(msg));
554  }
555  else
556  {
557  string msg = "Delete connection of \"" + feature->GetName() + "\"?";
558  msgBox.setWindowTitle("Delete connection?");
559  msgBox.setText(QString::fromStdString(msg));
560  }
561  msgBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Yes);
562  msgBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::No);
563  msgBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
564  guitimer->stop();
565  int ret = msgBox.exec();
566  guitimer->start(timerInterval);
567  switch (ret)
568  {
569  case QMessageBox::No:
570  return;
571  case QMessageBox::Yes:
572  deleteConnection(feature->GetUUID());
573  update();
574  break;
575  default:
576  break;
577  }
578  if (!selectedFeature)
579  return;
580  }
581 
582  // Nothing selected before, select first feature of (possible coming) connection
583  if (!selectedFeature)
584  {
585  selectedFeature = feature;
586  selectedGuiDevice = guidevice;
587  return;
588  }
589 
590  // Selected the same device type, so no connection is possible. Drop old selection and select the new one
591  if (guidevice->GetType() == selectedGuiDevice->GetType())
592  {
593  selectedFeature = feature;
594  selectedGuiDevice = guidevice;
595  return;
596  }
597 
598  // Selected different feature types, so no connection is possible. Drop old selection and select the new one
599  if (selectedFeature->GetType() != feature->GetType())
600  {
601  selectedFeature = feature;
602  selectedGuiDevice = guidevice;
603  return;
604  }
605 
606  // Everything ok -> try to connect them (and ask for coefficient if appliable)
607  double coefficient = 1.0;
608  bool ok = true;
609  string type = feature->GetType();
610  if (type == "std_msgs/Byte" || type == "std_msgs/Float32" || type == "std_msgs/Float64" || type == "std_msgs/Int16" ||
611  type == "std_msgs/Int32" || type == "std_msgs/Int64" || type == "std_msgs/Int8" || type == "std_msgs/UInt16" ||
612  type == "std_msgs/UInt32" || type == "std_msgs/UInt64" || type == "std_msgs/UInt8")
613  {
614  guitimer->stop();
615  QString input =
616  QInputDialog::getText(this, "Coefficient?", "Multiply all values with:", QLineEdit::Normal, "1.0", &ok);
617  coefficient = input.toDouble(&ok);
618  guitimer->start(timerInterval);
619  }
620  if (ok)
621  {
622  connectFeatures(selectedFeature->GetUUID(), feature->GetUUID(), coefficient);
623  selectedFeature = 0;
624  selectedGuiDevice = 0;
625  update();
626  }
627 }
628 
629 void TapiGui::loadButtonClicked()
630 {
631  // Get the default path (~/config.tapi) ans asks the user to choose a file (there (as a start))
632  string homedir = getenv("HOME");
633  string filename = homedir + "/config.tapi";
634  QString filePicker =
635  QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, "Open File", QString::fromStdString(filename), "Tapi-files (*.tapi)");
636  filename = filePicker.toStdString();
637  ifstream fileInput;
638  fileInput.open(filename);
639  bool error = true;
640 
641  // Try to open the file and read it
642  if (fileInput.is_open() && !fileInput.eof())
643  {
644  error = false;
645  string temp;
646 
647  // Clear everything of the current data in the core
648  clearAllButtonClicked();
649 
650  // Check if there is more than one line
651  getline(fileInput, temp);
652  if (fileInput.eof())
653  error = true;
654 
655  // Now read line by line
656  while (!fileInput.eof())
657  {
658  // If it's an entry of a device, read its data and tell the core that it shall "connect" this device
659  if (temp == "[Device]")
660  {
661  string uuid;
662  string name;
663  uint8_t type;
664  unsigned long heartbeat;
665  getline(fileInput, uuid);
666  getline(fileInput, name);
667  getline(fileInput, temp);
668  type = (uint8_t)stoi(temp);
669  getline(fileInput, temp);
670  heartbeat = (unsigned long)stoul(temp);
671  getline(fileInput, temp);
672  map<string, Tapi::Feature> features;
673  while (temp == "[DeviceFeature]")
674  {
675  string featureUUID;
676  string featureName;
677  string featureType;
678  getline(fileInput, featureUUID);
679  getline(fileInput, featureName);
680  getline(fileInput, featureType);
681  Tapi::Feature feature = Tapi::Feature(featureType, featureName, featureUUID);
682  features.emplace(featureUUID, feature);
683  getline(fileInput, temp);
684  }
685  addDeviceToTapi(type, name, uuid, features);
686  }
687 
688  // If it's an entry of a connection, read its data and tell the gui it shall connect the correspondong
689  // devices/features. They have to exist already or the entry is thrown away
690  else if (temp == "[Connection]")
691  {
692  string subscriberUUID;
693  string subscriberFeatureUUID;
694  string publisherUUID;
695  string publisherFeatureUUID;
696  double coefficient;
697  getline(fileInput, subscriberUUID);
698  getline(fileInput, subscriberFeatureUUID);
699  getline(fileInput, publisherUUID);
700  getline(fileInput, publisherFeatureUUID);
701  getline(fileInput, temp);
702  coefficient = stod(temp);
703  connectFeatures(subscriberFeatureUUID, publisherFeatureUUID, coefficient);
704  getline(fileInput, temp);
705  }
706 
707  // Unknown type of entry, maybe an entry of a device or onnection was to short or to long?
708  else
709  {
710  ROS_ERROR("Wrong line: %s", temp.c_str());
711  error = true;
712  break;
713  }
714  }
715  }
716 
717  // Print error message if something went wrong during the load of the file
718  if (error)
719  {
720  QMessageBox msgBox;
721  msgBox.setWindowTitle("Error");
722  msgBox.setText("Error loading configuration");
723  msgBox.setInformativeText("Maybe the file doesn't exist or is no valid configuration file?");
724  msgBox.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
725  msgBox.setDefaultButton(QMessageBox::Ok);
726  msgBox.setIcon(QMessageBox::Warning);
727  guitimer->stop();
728  msgBox.exec();
729  guitimer->start(timerInterval);
730  }
731 }
732 
733 void TapiGui::saveButtonClicked()
734 {
735  // Get the default path (~/config.tapi) ans asks the user to choose a file (there (as a start))
736  string homedir = getenv("HOME");
737  string filename = homedir + "/config.tapi";
738  QString filePicker =
739  QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, "Save File", QString::fromStdString(filename), "Tapi-files (*.tapi)");
740  filename = filePicker.toStdString();
741  ofstream fileOutput;
742  fileOutput.open(filename);
743 
744  // Now just iterate through all devices and save their data as text line by line, including a list of all their
745  // features
746  for (auto it = devices.begin(); it != devices.end(); ++it)
747  {
748  fileOutput << "[Device]\n";
749  fileOutput << it->second->GetUUID() << "\n";
750  fileOutput << it->second->GetName() << "\n";
751  fileOutput << (int)it->second->GetType() << "\n";
752  fileOutput << it->second->GetHeartbeat() << "\n";
753  vector<Tapi::Feature*> features = it->second->GetSortedFeatures();
754  for (int j = 0; j < features.size(); j++)
755  {
756  fileOutput << "[DeviceFeature]\n";
757  fileOutput << features.at(j)->GetUUID() << "\n";
758  fileOutput << features.at(j)->GetName() << "\n";
759  fileOutput << features.at(j)->GetType() << "\n";
760  }
761  }
762 
763  // After that iterate through all connections and also save their data as text line by line
764  for (auto it = connections.begin(); it != connections.end(); ++it)
765  {
766  fileOutput << "[Connection]\n";
767  fileOutput << it->second.GetSubscriberUUID() << "\n";
768  fileOutput << it->second.GetSubscriberFeatureUUID() << "\n";
769  fileOutput << it->second.GetPublisherUUID() << "\n";
770  fileOutput << it->second.GetPublisherFeatureUUID() << "\n";
771  fileOutput << it->second.GetCoefficient() << "\n";
772  }
773  fileOutput.close();
774 }
775 }

void checkForGuiUpdate()
